pageTitle: Blue Life American Rebel Halter Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Bottoms sold separately. Made in the USA. Hand wash. Lining: 87% polyamide/13% elastane. Shell: 65% cotton/30% modal/5% elastane. Sheer netting brings a bohemian element to this Blue Life halter top. Split front panel and racer back. Exposed elastic band. Hook-and-eye closure. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The brainchild of Ling Su Chinn and Jen Rossi, Blue Life is the epitome of casual cool. With Joie Rucker and Michael Glasser (both of Rich & Skinny), Blue Life is fast becoming the "It" girl knit line with a sexy California attitude. Flattering cuts in the finest cottons make Blue Life the go-to line for laid-back, worn-in, effortless style.
